item.title: Lime bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand, 28th October
item.description:
There are bikes related to lime blocking pavement, cycle stand and fire exit around 55 Baker street, Dorset Street and Blandford street. The bikes need to be removed

item.title: Heavy metal gate hanging dangerously by pavement by only one rusty hinge, 28th October
item.description:
This solid metal heavy gate 8' high by 3' wide is hanging precariously by one rusty hinge, the other having sheared off. It could easily fall onto the busy pavement and crush a child or a pet. It is also a security issue, but this is secondary to the danger to passers by.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large falling branches and excess leaves in drive and path !, 28th October
item.description:
I we are two elderly pensioners who have difficulty in walking so would require the tree to be pruned as leaves fall )and large branches on us aswell as car), especially when wet and it is hard to avoid them and scared we may fall and cause further injury to ourselves also people who pass leave rubbish and even dog feaces and that still hasn't been resolved!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridgeway Drive, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
